0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE KILLING OF FIVE AGENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY IN KAPAI, LANAO DEL SUR AND TO URGE THE CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO WORK TOWARDS THE SWIFT DELIVERY OF JUSTICE FOR THE VICTIMS AND THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02246
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE KILLING OF FIVE AGENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY IN KAPAI, LANAO DEL SUR AND TO URGE THE CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO WORK TOWARDS THE SWIFT DELIVERY OF JUSTICE FOR THE VICTIMS AND THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES
